name: HitBoxing
description:
HITBOXING is a clumsy arcade-style boxing simulator that can be played both alone and with friends! Dodge uppercuts, block enemy hooks and defeat opponents one by one.

Сontrols is easy to learn, but can you achieve mastery?

Try on Google Play:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.KoStudio.HITBOXING
